title: Shinanai Otoko ni Koishita Shoujo
original_name: 死なない男に恋した少女
sinopse:
Node Kugito killed himself various times in his life. The result, he noticed that he's immortal.

Now a serial killer has come to his town. By chance he meets the killer at the park at night. A serial killer against an immortal boy. Who will stand victorious?

(Source: MU)
